properties.name: items
properties.description: Task data items array. Set separately for list display; set group_id to associate with groups for grouped display; supports tree structure (children)

properties.name: groups
properties.description: Grouped data array. Items need to set group_id to associate, supports expand/collapse

properties.name: baselineItems
properties.description: Baseline comparison data, displayed below task bars

properties.name: viewType
properties.description: View type: hour, day, week, month, quarter, year, default month

properties.name: start
properties.description: Start time (Unix timestamp, seconds). Auto-calculated from items if not set

properties.name: end
properties.description: End time (Unix timestamp, seconds). Auto-calculated from items if not set

properties.name: draggable
properties.description: Whether to allow dragging task bars to modify time

properties.name: styles
properties.description: Style configuration (theme, row height, task bar height, etc.)

properties.name: toolbarOptions
properties.description: Toolbar configuration, can configure list of view types to display

properties.name: viewOptions
properties.description: View configuration (time tick format, unit width, scroll loading, etc.)

properties.name: linkOptions
properties.description: Link relationship configuration (dependency types, arrows, line types, etc.)

properties.name: disabledLoadOnScroll
properties.description: Whether to disable scroll loading, default true

properties.name: multiple
properties.description: Whether to enable multiple selection mode (requires selectable to be true)

properties.name: quickTimeFocus
properties.description: Whether to enable quick time focus (click task bar endpoints to quickly locate)

properties.name: async
properties.description: Whether to enable asynchronous loading of sub-tasks

properties.name: linkable
properties.description: Whether to allow creating task link relationships

properties.name: virtualScrollEnabled
properties.description: Whether to enable virtual scrolling, default true

properties.name: loadingDelay
properties.description: Loading delay time (milliseconds), used to avoid flickering, default 0

properties.name: loadOnScroll
properties.description: Scroll loading event, event object contains start and end timestamps
